creditline: The Simmons Family Endowment for Textiles
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: black ground fabric; embroidered in predominately orange with symmetrical floral and foliage motifs; short sides have scrolling floral and leaf motifs; band of orange, green and red off-center; some floating organic shapes on each side between central main design and designs at edges; black fringe with black and orange tassels at short ends
title: Scarf
